text: The Bahia worm lizard (Leposternon polystegum) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Brazil. This species demonstrates sexual dimorphism with the males having larger, longer bodies than the females. Its diet generally consists of ants, earthworms, and termites. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 1851 Category:Taxa named by André Marie Constant Duméril Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Bahia worm lizard
